file_content.text: My uninvited guest finally arrives. Your feelings betray you, youngster. I sensed your murderous intentions the moment you entered my sanctum.
What's more, your unshielded mind has revealed your accomplice--my loving wife.
That's knowledge you'll take to your grave.
Won't do you any good.
She sends her love.
Lady Grathan says "hello."
Your unshielded mind reveals that you're scum.
I can tell you're a lowlife.
Ah, another naive youngster who's fallen under my wife's influence.
Cellvanta is a user, child. She's obsessed with power. It's one of the things that attracted me to her--but it's outgrown its amusement.
You and my wife obviously have a death wish. I will grant them both--first yours, then hers.
The only death I wish is yours, Grathan.
You die instead.
Ambition is the downfall of many.
A man should take care of his wife first.
I'll go second.
I'll make it special for her.
I'm waiting.
I sense no fear in you. Are you stupid, or merely uneducated?
I am Lord Grathan. I stand in open defiance of the Dark Council, and they fail to silence me.
I see before me a primitive, callow puppet who's wandered into the wrong room. Who are you to think you can kill a Sith Lord?
Let me show you who I am.
Enough talk. [attack]
I am Lord Baras's apprentice.
I think you know my master...
Interesting. I thought Baras knew better. He's a coward. An observer. He sits in his chamber watching and spying as others act.
You're a slave--a peon about to die for someone else's cause. You should be swimming in shame.
Imagine your shame when a slave kills you.
You'll be drowning in it.
Maybe you could put me to better use.
Could you utilize me?
I'll sprinkle your ashes in my reekcat's litter garden. You'll be useful there.
I'm going to be swimming in your blood!
I'm tired of you. [attack]
You need to get your eyes checked.
You vision is blurred.
And you're about to have yours plucked.
I am death itself, child. Come embrace the darkness!
